detectors.description:
CardanoSideChain.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CardanoSideChain.sol#166-176) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _gonBalances[to] = _gonBalances[to].add(gonValue) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CardanoSideChain.sol#173)

detectors.description:
owner() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CardanoSideChain.sol#64-66)

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CardanoSideChain.sol#73-76)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CardanoSideChain.sol#78-82)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- CardanoSideChain.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CardanoSideChain.sol#150-156)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- CardanoSideChain.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CardanoSideChain.sol#158-164)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- CardanoSideChain.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CardanoSideChain.sol#201-208)
